newsitem.title: USA: Freeport-McMoRan Q1 shr $0.04 after charge.
newsitem.headline: Freeport-McMoRan Q1 shr $0.04 after charge.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

Net income to common stock and per primary share includes a net charge of $6.8 million (0.28 per share) for the 1997 period and a net gain of $3.0 million ($0.11 per share) for the 1996 period for the impact of the items discussed below in notes (a), (c), (d), (e) and (f):

(a) The 1997 quarter includes the reimbursement of $2.9 million in previously expensed costs as a result of IMC-Agrico's participation in a potential phosphate mine and upgrading project in Sri Lanka. The 1996 quarter includes a $3.0 million charge for asset valuations at IMC-Agrico.
(b) The 1997 and 1996 quarters include a reduction of $7.1 million caused by FRP's disproportionate interest in IMC-Agrico cash distributions.
(c) Represents a gain resulting from the increase in FRP's
(d) Represents costs associated with the North Bay Junop
(e) The 1996 quarter includes a $2.0 million charge for stock appreciation rights costs.
(f) Includes a first-quarter 1997 charge of $9.2 million and a first-quarter gain of $1.2 million resulting from a disproportionate share of FRP distributions received by FTX during the periods.
